Class DxSAPSpace2

java.lang.Object
com.github.antzGames.gdx.ode4j.ode.internal.DDestructible

com.github.antzGames.gdx.ode4j.ode.internal.DxGeom
com.github.antzGames.gdx.ode4j.ode.internal.DxSpace
com.github.antzGames.gdx.ode4j.ode.internal.DxSAPSpace2
All Implemented Interfaces:
DGeom, DSapSpace, DSpace
public class DxSAPSpace2 extends DxSpace implements DSapSpace
Original code: OPCODE - Optimized Collision Detection Copyright (C) 2001 Pierre Terdiman Homepage: http://www.codercorner.com/Opcode.htm Temporally coherent version of SAPSpace with additional BVH tree for collide2 performance improvement.

    • cleanGeoms

      public void cleanGeoms()
      Description copied from class: DxSpace
      Turn all dirty geoms into clean geoms by computing their AABBs and any other space data structures that are required. this should clear the GEOM_DIRTY and GEOM_AABB_BAD flags of all geoms.
      Specified by:
      cleanGeoms in interface DSpace
      Specified by:
      cleanGeoms in class DxSpace
